name: 86Box Floppy Disk Image
summary: An 86F file is a disk image used by 86Box, a fork of the PCem emulator that emulates PC hardware from the 1980s and 90s. It is saved in the 86Box Floppy Disk (86F) format, which is designed to replicate actual floppy disk images. 86F files may contain an application or a game.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
